title: Senior Relationship Manager — MEA
summary: Cover UHNW/HNW MEA clients from Dubai; strong acquisition and cross-border expertise.
description:
## Position Overview
Lead and grow a portfolio of HNW/UHNW clients across the Middle East & Africa from Dubai. Act as lead advisor with full booking and credit capabilities, delivering holistic wealth solutions and cross-border expertise.

## Key Responsibilities
- Originate and deepen client relationships across GCC/MEA markets.
- Structure multi-asset portfolios and bespoke lending solutions with product specialists.
- Ensure DFSA-compliant processes and strong KYC/AML discipline.
- Coordinate cross-border coverage with Switzerland and other booking centres.
- Drive commercial pipeline; convert referrals; maintain high client satisfaction.

## Core Requirements
- 5–10+ years PB coverage in MEA with portable network.
- Strong investment and credit know-how; proven asset gathering.
- Fluency in English; Arabic a strong plus.
- Solid understanding of DFSA and regional regulatory frameworks.

## Essential Competencies
Entrepreneurial hunter/farmer balance, cultural fluency, meticulous compliance, collaborative team player, high integrity.

## What Our Client Offers
Tier-1 brand, Dubai platform with regional reach, competitive grid, credit platform, and clear growth path.
